channel.title: Will give admin if sum1 helps me get my server back up again
channel.description: ok so i had my server up about a week ago i used no portfowarding wat so ever just utorrent and no.ip and it worked, i tried the next day and i couldnt get it online i need help from sum1 who knows how to get one up im using a linksys wireless n gigabit router if u need to know please pm me if u definatly know how to fix it or u need any other info[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2008, 07:14:15 pm[/size][hr]omg cant sum1 just help me

item.title: Will give admin if sum1 helps me get my server back up again
item.dc:creator: @negative101 negative101
item.description:
@negative101 wrote:

for linksys router goto gaming and application and where the first box is put way ever u want and the next box is the port it’s goi g to be k. And same for next box then the next box e ted u last 3 digits of ur ip address and the check off the last box and hit ok thing at the bottom

                   And that should work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2008, 10:00:39 pm[/size][hr]sox about bad typing stupid phone corrects

Me ok for the second to last box put last 3 digits of ur ip adress then last box u cjeck of and at bottom u hit ok and that’s it and u have port forwarded =]
